showScoreExcerpt:
"Director Cullman combines all the elements of writing, acting, and design to create a play that is equally powerful and emotionally moving. The pacing is perfect and poignant ...Playwright McCraney often uses music in the way a musical does, to heighten emotion and express the feeling of a scene, but even more haunting is the Cullmanâ€™s strategic use of silence: he makes us sit in the uncomfortable and the painful in ways that are remarkably evocative."
